files.patch:
@@ -150,7 +150,7 @@ This example uses an `` attribute to simulate projecting a compone
Reminder!
-The `` element is a logical construct that you can use to group other DOM elements; however, the `` itself is not rendered in the DOM tree. +The `ng-container` element is a logical construct that is used to group other DOM elements; however, the `ng-container` itself is not rendered in the DOM tree.
